data.text:
Itâs all here, and now, so is season 2 of the smash HBO hit House of the Dragon. Explore iconic series, award-winning movies, fresh originals, family favorites, and more. Discover the best entertainment for every mood. Max â the one to watch. Subscribe now!

With Max you'll get:

â¢ Unlimited access to thousands of TV shows and movies.

â¢ A deep library of brands and studios like HBO, the Wizarding World, HGTV, TLC, Magnolia Network, Food Network, and Adult Swim.

â¢ The largest streaming library of the DC Universe shows and movies.

â¢ Hundreds of original series from HBO and Max.

â¢ CNN Max, a 24/7 live feed featuring breaking news and coverage of the worldâs biggest stories. Now available in beta to all Max subscribers â at no additional cost.

â¢ Stream select live games and matches from the NBA, NHL, NCAAÂ® March MadnessÂ®, MLBâ¢, U.S. Soccer, Bellator, and premier cycling events with the B/R Sports Add-On â on us for a limited time.*

â¢ Award-winning shows and movies that everyone's talking about like the HBO Original series The Last of Us, Succession, The White Lotus, House of the Dragon, and more.

â¢ Iconic favorite TV shows like Friends, South Park, Rick and Morty, 90-Day FiancÃ©, Fixer Upper, Beat Bobby Flay, House Hunters, Sesame Street, Looney Tunes, and more.

â¢ Family-friendly entertainment for the whole household.

â¢ Fascinating documentaries and unscripted series.

â¢ Enjoy your favorite shows and movies at home or on-the-go. Max is available on TV, web browser, mobile, tablet, and gaming console devices.

Features:

â¢ Browse or search with ease across HBO, movies, series, genres, and brands.

â¢ Download shows and movies you love to watch on-the-go with select plans. (Download limits vary by plan.)

â¢ Personalized profiles for the entire family with customizable ratings, profile PIN protection, and kid-proof exit.

â¢ Pick up episodes and movies where you left off across your favorite devices.

â¢ Keep up with everything you love, all in one place with My Stuff.

â¢ Watch on multiple devices at the same time. (Limits vary by plan.)

â¢ Stream with high quality video and surround sound on select plans.

Content and feature availability on Max may vary by region. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country. Language availability varies by country.

Your subscription will automatically renew at the then-current price of your plan unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the renewal. Your App Store account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. You can manage or cancel your subscription by visiting the App Store app or Subscriptions under Settings on your Apple device after purchase.

*Pricing and availability of the B/R Sports Add-On after the promotional period will vary by subscription provider.â¢/Â© 2024 MLB
